Rulings.HAT:
● Continuous Spell/Trap cards must remain face-up for their effects to be applied. 
If this card is destroyed, before you use the additional normal summon, you don't get to use it.

PSCT.Vegas:
① During your Main Phase, you can Normal Summon 1 Beast-Warrior in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. 
(You can only gain this effect once per turn.) 
② All Beast-Warriors you control gain 100 ATK.
